subject: Re: [junit] Methods with random numbers
msgSnippet: On Mon, 2003-03-10 at 21:08, sudhir wrote: Hi I am trying to write junit test cases for a class. Some of the functions in the class use random numbers by
messageBody:
On Mon, 2003-03-10 at 21:08, sudhir wrote: Hi

I am trying to write junit test cases for a class.
Some of the functions in the class use random numbers
by calling the function Math.random(). Is there any
way to verify the method.

Thank you

sudhir shakya

Wrap the functionality of getting the number in some Provider interface,
stub the Provider for the test.

public interface NumberGenerator {
// I forget what type Math.random returns
public double number();
}

public class RandomNumberGenerator implements NumberGenerator {
public double number() {
return Math.random();
}
}

public class TotallyPredictableNumberGenerator implements
NumberGenerator {
public double number() {
return 1024;
}
}
